text: Micranthocereus streckeri is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Brazil. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist shrubland and rocky areas. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Sources== * Taylor, N.P. 2002. Micranthocereus streckeri. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. Category:Flora of Brazil streckeri Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Micranthocereus streckeri
